text: Genius Cru are a UK garage crew from London. They are best known for the song "Boom Selection" which reached No. 12 on the UK Singles Chart and No. 1 on the UK Dance Chart in early 2001. Later the same year, they scored another top 40 hit with "Course Bruv". ==Discography== ===Singles=== *"Waiting" (1999), Kronik *Angel EP (2000), G Records *"Boom Selection" (2000), Kronik/Incentive - UK #12 *"Course Bruv" (2001), Incentive - UK #39 *"Waiting 2013" (2013), Genius Beats ==References== ==External links== * Category:Musical groups established in 1998 Category:UK garage groups Category:English electronic music groups Category:English hip hop groups Category:Musical groups from London
title: Genius Cru
